text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump You are kidding aren’t you? You mean people are getting the jobs back they had lost due to the fact Trump refused to respond to the Coronavirus. And now that there are 50,000+ new cases a day, how many people will lose their jobs, again, because businesses will close.
